WR-09817DB-S.title: WR-09817DB-S
text: Waterproof finished double pannier bag design.
ECO fabric waterproof collection.
Reflective safety care patch on the rear of bag.
Top roll closing with webbing buckle.
Middle panel on the top of rack with velcro fixing.
With 4 join points side released buckle connecting bags.
Each back of bag with stopper to hold the down of the rack.
With handle strap on the top of the bag.
Size: 26 x 10.5 x 37 cm (single side)

TR-231003R.title: TR-231003R
text: Inner pouch with waterproof finished design.
Outer of bag with stitching design.
Main storage bag with top roll closing buckle.
Front panel with extra zipper pocket.
Top cover with another zipper pocket .
Two bag connecting fixed.
Size: 29 x 12 x 31.5 cm (single side)

WR-17040XL.title: WR-17040XL
text: Extra large Cargo Bike double pannier bag design, Waterproof finished.
Middle connecting webbing hold on the rack of bike.
Top flap cover including, top roll closing with buckle.
2 alloy hook attached fixing the flap cover on the each bag.
Inner with strong plastic sheet support attached.
Top handle attached . Reflective safety care patch including.
Size: 38 x 17.5 x 29 cm (single side)

TY-031003-23.title: TY-031003-23
text: Double Pannier
Webbing fastening with Rear Rack
With Handle strap carry
Reflective security care
Size: 29.5 x 12 x 27cm (one side)

TY-031001-23.title: TY-031001-23
text: 3 unit pannier bag
Top pocket can not be moved
with webbing & ladder lock for fastening
Size: 49 x 29 x 41cm

TY-131002MPR.title: TY-131002MPR
text: Triple Pannier with top Rucksack
Rucksack with function shoulder padding
with Mesh pocket in the front
Down with double pannier Hooks fastening
each side with extra front Mesh pocket
Strong Plastic sheet support the bag
security Reflective care
Size: 34 x 14 x 38.5cm (one side)
Top Rucksack: 30 x 13 x41cm
